article_title: What France Can Teach Us About ObamaCare

article_metadata.description: In about a year and a half, the ObamaCare employer mandate kicks in. Firms with 50 or more employees will be required to provide expensive health insurance for their workers and their dependents or pay a fine of $2,000 per employee. What difference will that make?     Suppose an employer has 49 [...]
article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman
